wikitext.*:
'''ANA''' is an [[Elvish]] [[Sundocarme|root]], with two different meanings.<ref>{{LR|Etymologies}}, p. 348</ref>

==ANA<sup>1</sup>==

Meaning: "to, towards" (see also [[NĀ|NĀ<sup>1</sup>]])

*[[Primitive Quendian]]: ''anta-'' ("to present, give"), ''annā'' ("gift")<ref name="PE17">{{PE|17}}</ref>{{rp|90}}
**[[Quenya]]: ''anta-'' ("give"); ''[[anna]]'', ''anwa'' ("gift"); ''ante'' (fem., "giver"), ''anto'' (masc., "giver"); ''anta'' ("face")
**[[Noldorin]]: ''anno'' ("to give"); ''[[ant]]'' ("gift")
**[[Sindarin]]: ''anha-, aned'' ("to give");,<ref name="PE17" />{{rp|93}}<ref>{{PE|22c}}, p. 163</ref> ''ann, anw'' ("gift")

Compounds:
*[[Yavanna|''Yav'''anna''''']]
*''Ary'''ante''''' ("Day-bringer")

==ANA<sup>2</sup>==

Meaning: "be, exist" (see also [[NĀ|NĀ<sup>2</sup>]])

*[[Quenya]]: ''[[anwa]]'', ''[[nanwa]]''

{{references}}
